content:
Subject: Re: Incoming Email Test

Dear sender@external.com,

Thank you for sending this test email. We have successfully received and processed your message. As per our standard procedures, we will review and respond accordingly.

Please note that this email has been marked as processed and will be removed from our inbox. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
